text:
Hey Nick, you probably aren't finding a guide like that because building a theme fully in Vue the way one might build a Nuxt or Gridsome site not advised.

There is the <https://github.com/HubSpot/cms-vue-boilerplate|Vue Boilerplate>, which I've used many times and is a great starting point for building Vue-based _modules_ for use within a theme/site, but it's still best practice to build the theme itself using HTML/HubL
